quotes.message: Retirement, a time to do what you want to do, when you want to do it, where you want to do it, and, how you want to do it.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: Retirement may be looked upon either as a prolonged holiday or as a rejection, a being thrown on to the scrap-heap.
quotes.name: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.message: The key to retirement is to find joy in the little things.
quotes.name: Susan Miller

quotes.message: Retirement has been a discovery of beauty for me. I never had the time before to notice the beauty of my grandkids, my wife, the tree outside my very own front door. And, the beauty of time itself.
quotes.name: Hartman Jule

quotes.message: Retirement without the love of letters is a living burial.
quotes.name: Seneca

quotes.message: Retirement: That's when you return from work one day and say, 'Hi, Honey, I'm home, forever.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Retire from work, but not from life.
quotes.name: M.K. Soni

quotes.message: To enjoy a long, comfortable retirement, save more today.
quotes.name: Suze Orman

quotes.message: Retirement kills more people than hard work ever did.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: The best time to start thinking about your retirement is before the boss does.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Retirement may be an ending, a closing, but it is also a new beginning.
quotes.name: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.message: The trouble with retirement is that you never get a day off.
quotes.name: Abe Lemons

quotes.message: Retirement: Something arrived at in haste and lived at in leisure.
quotes.name: Dave Erhard

quotes.message: If you start thinking about retirement in six months' time, you're already there.
quotes.name: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.message: Retirement is when the living is easy and the payments are hard.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: When a man retires, his wife gets twice the husband but only half the income.
quotes.name: Chi Chi Rodriguez

quotes.message: Life begins at retirement.
quotes.name: Unkown

quotes.message: The goal of retirement is to live off your assets-not on them.
quotes.name: Frank Eberhart

quotes.message: Retirement from Job does not mean retirement from life! It is the beginning not an end!
quotes.name: Ravi Samuel

quotes.message: Retirement is having nothing to do and someone always keeping you from it.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: In retirement, every day is Boss Day and every day is Employee Appreciation Day.
quotes.name: Terri Guillemets

quotes.message: Retirement: It's nice to get out of the rat race, but you have to learn to get along with less cheese.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: I'm not just retiring from the company, I'm also retiring from my stress, my commute, my alarm clock, and my iron.
quotes.name: Hartman Jule

quotes.message: I never stopped doing anything [when I retired], I stopped getting paid for it.
quotes.name: Bill Chavanne

quotes.message: Retirement itself is the best gift. No gold watch could ever top it.
quotes.name: Abigail Charleson

quotes.message: In retirement, only money and symptoms are consequential.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Retirement is a one-way trip to insignificance.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: Retirement to me does not mean nothing to do but the realization of the decisions I made in the past. That I made in my life.
quotes.name: Jack Bowman

quotes.message: Retirement . . . is when you stop living at work and begin working at living.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: When you retire, you switch bosses from the one who hired you to the one who married you.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Retirement is a time given to find God within yourself.
quotes.name: Walter

quotes.message: The harder you work, the harder it is to surrender.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Don't simply retire from something; have something to retire to.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: Retirement: World's longest coffee break.
quotes.name: Author Unknown

quotes.message: Retirement is like a long vacation in Las Vegas. The goal is to enjoy it the fullest, but not so fully that you run out of money.
quotes.name: Jonathan Clements

quotes.message: Retirement is a great opportunity to become the person you have always wanted to be but have never been.
quotes.name: Dave Erhard

quotes.message: The challenge of retirement is how to spend time without spending money.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Retirement is wonderful if you have two essentials - much to live on and much to live for.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Retirement: The time in your life when time is no longer money.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: For retirement brings repose, and repose allows a kindly judgment of all things.
quotes.name: John Sharp Williams

quotes.message: Retirement requires the invention of a new hedonism, not a return to the hedonism of youth.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: And in the end it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Retirement gives each of us another opportunity to smell the flowers. Once again, some of us will, and some of us won't.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: In my retirement I go for a short swim at least once or twice every day. It's either that or buy a new golf ball.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Retirement means no pressure, no stress, no heartache... unless you play golf.
quotes.name: Gene Perret

quotes.message: Retirement is a time to look back with satisfaction, and a time to look ahead with anticipation. A time to fill each day with enjoyment. A very special time for you.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Retirement brings the ball finally onto your court, where you get to make all the rules.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Not dead, just very much retired. To old friends, to retirement, to new beginnings.
quotes.name: Debra Hill

quotes.message: Retirement is eighty-five. You're all almost mandatory retirement age.
quotes.name: Glen A. Larson

quotes.message: I know exactly what I'm gonna do when I retire. Buy a beach bar. Surf all day, and margaritas 'till sun-up.
quotes.name: Donald P. Bellisario

quotes.message: Retiring nature. It means I want to live long enough... to retire.
quotes.name: Sydney Newman

quotes.message: I'm retired, not dead. I mean different. Okay, a little boring.
quotes.name: Luc Besson

quotes.message: Undercover agents don't retire. They just go deeper.
quotes.name: Shane Brennan

quotes.message: I don't mean being a cop. I mean to quit, retire, be a regular person.
quotes.name: Gary DeVore

quotes.message: I have to say, a lot of guys, when they retire, they just drift. But... you're really making this work.
quotes.name: Andrew W. Marlowe

quotes.message: Retiring and sailing around the world on my boat. We are living the dream.
quotes.name: Will Ferrell

quotes.message: When I retire from racing, I don't even like to think about it, I feel that each day I can run, touch wood, with, er, injury free conditions then I'll run til I drop.
quotes.name: Nick Park

quotes.message: I've seen people get old, retire, and die. Rarely on the same day.
quotes.name: Cory Goodman

quotes.message: For many people, retirement is simply the point in their lives when they stop working for money.
quotes.name: S. Jamie Gayton

quotes.message: In order to achieve you retirement vision, enjoy financial independence, and prepare for any emergencies that may arise later in life, you must start saving for retirement now.
quotes.name: S. Jamie Gayton

quotes.message: Retirement is more than simply withdrawing from work. Retirement often leads to new options in later life.
quotes.name: Harry R. Moody

quotes.message: Retirement has come to mean an expansion of leisure time, most of it during the retirement years.
quotes.name: Harry R. Moody

quotes.message: Retirement as a time of leisure is feasible only with a certain degree of wealth.
quotes.name: Harry R. Moody

quotes.message: Retirement is a social institution with rules about when it is permissible for workers to leave the paid labor force.
quotes.name: Joan T. Erber

quotes.message: Transition from a working environment to retirement poses financial as well as emotional challenges.
quotes.name: Irving S. Schloss

quotes.message: At the outset, the most important myth to dispel is that retirement represents the finish line.
quotes.name: Irving S. Schloss

quotes.message: One of the major turnings in life takes place at 'retirement.
quotes.name: John Fry

quotes.message: Retirement is a convenient social expedient for removing from work employed workers who reach certain ages.
quotes.name: John Fry

quotes.message: Retirement should be looked on as the end of the beginning rather than as the beginning of the end.
quotes.name: John Fry

quotes.message: Yes, there can be retirement from a primary job but new opportunities await everyone to share their lessons from life and make the 'rest if our years the best or our years!'
quotes.name: John Heide

quotes.message: Yes, retirement is alluring and enchanting for many!
quotes.name: John Heide
